title: [PRICES REDUCED AGAIN 10/9] NC Find - T205, T202 - Almost All Gone!
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: [PRICES REDUCED AGAIN 10/9] NC Find - T205, T202 - Almost All Gone!
posts.post_content:
As all of you probably know by now, I'm brokering these cards from the recent North Carolina find. The gentleman that owns the collection will be the payee, by money order or cashiers check only, and he will handle the shipping. I completely stand behind all of the transactions.

We finally rounded up the remaining cards, with prices and scans here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/ncfind[/url]

Offers encouraged.
Emails have priority: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]

9/22: All listed asking prices were reduced by 10%!
9/27: All listed asking prices were reduced by another 10%!
10/3: All listed asking prices on remaining cards were reduced by yet another 10%!
10/9: All listed asking prices on remaining cards were reduced by yet another 10%!

PLEASE NOTE: The prices listed on the website are after the price reductions have already been applied.

Thanks!
E-Mail sent for the t205 Scanlan

Email Sent 

Thanks,

Mike
Email sent - thanks Trae

about T206 Chance and possibly others.  Thanks,
Ian
E-mail sent. Thanks, Brian

Hi Trae,

If still available, I'll take the Carolina Brights.

Thanks,

Turner Engle
Thanks, everyone - I'm replying to emails now. Turner, sorry, that one sold earlier in the day, but I'm just getting back to my computer to take it down.
Doesn't seem to be an issue with Trae looking over these deals, but I'd also throw in my hat as standing 100% behind the gentleman receiving the payment and handling shipping. Stand up guy.

Very pleasent dealings Trae thanks!  I look forward to getting my cards.

Ian
Thanks, Chris, Ian, and everyone else that has bought cards!
email sent......

Bump for 10% reduction on asking prices across the board.
Offers welcome - thank you!
I just wanted to say that I received the T206 Cy Young portrait that I purchased from this collection today and both the card and service were top notch.
Trae, Card came today, very happy with it, Scott's shipping was top notch. Very happy all around. Thanks again Ralph

Trae,

I will take the Hoblitzell "No Stats, Name Correct, No Cin." :D

Regards,

Turner Engle

Trae, I also received my cards late last week.  I haven't opened them yet.. for whatever reason I like to let the ones I'm real excited sit a while, as if under the Christmas tree.  Anyway, thanks for fast shipment and very nice transaction.  If the cards are 1/2 as nice as pictured I know I'll be very happy.

Ian

Thanks, everyone!!

Turner, much appreciated! Email reply coming soon. :D
Ian, no way! That's awesome, but something I could never do, haha. Cards I get in the mail are lucky to stay boxed for 60 seconds even. Anyway, I know you'll love them!

with new price reduction, I'm even eyeing a few more... I'll send email if I decide to grab a couple more.  Thanks,
Ian
